page.title: 08HOUSING IN THE BORDON AREA
page.content:
Bordon is a large village but it is quickly developing into a small town.New housing estates are being built all the time and the old houses are being demolished or updated.Before this new development the main residential area belonged to the army.There is some council development and now a vast increse in private residential areas.
To the west of Bordon there are small rural settlements such as Oakhanger, Binswood and Shortheath. There are not many houses in these areas but there are quite a few farms and cottages,on the east side of Bordon. On both sides of the A325,there are mainly army residential areas including a hospital for the armed forces. .
